title: mac book air  with green light and amber light after but wont turn on
message: Hi I have and mac book air with green light and amber light thereafter  but it would not turn on this is an  820-00165-A  but I notice when I remove the io board  and plug back in the charger it would turn on so I found u6010  pp3v3_so would be missing when io board is plugin I change the io board twice and still the same issue what am doing wrong.

title: mac book air  with green light and amber light after but wont turn on
message: So does the machine turn on if you just leave the flat cable to the IO board disconnected?

title: mac book air  with green light and amber light after but wont turn on
message: yes, it turns on I change the cable twice and still the same problem.

title: mac book air  with green light and amber light after but wont turn on
message:
Your problem is inside of J9500.
Pin 9 goes to ground shield, when flex inserted...

title: mac book air  with green light and amber light after but wont turn on
message: that is correct j9500 pin 9 goes to ground but how you fix that problem.

title: mac book air  with green light and amber light after but wont turn on
message: You probably need to change the connector...

title: mac book air  with green light and amber light after but wont turn on
message: Provide high quality photos of that connector.

title: mac book air  with green light and amber light after but wont turn on
message: No Title

title: mac book air  with green light and amber light after but wont turn on
message: Try with known good flat cable plugged in as well as the battery and try to start from the charger. If it starts with the battery, cable, and charger plugged in, then it's more than likely your charger has issues. 2015 MacBooks have issues with certain chargers if they aren't OEM originals.

title: mac book air  with green light and amber light after but wont turn on
message: My only guess is you are plugging the cable in upside down.

title: mac book air  with green light and amber light after but wont turn on
message: I went mad with this issue months ago --- was the charger at fault, even though it was an original/genuine Apple one, but I had a magsafe 1->2 converter on it.  Try with a known good working magsafe 2 charger for that model.

title: mac book air  with green light and amber light after but wont turn on
message:
"j9500 pin 9 goes to ground"
If 3V3_S0 is shorted to ground inside connector, no matter any components changes.

Connect flex to J9500 and disconnect the other side from IO board.
If short persists, try other flex, or change J9500.

title: mac book air  with green light and amber light after but wont turn on
message:
So PP3V3_S0 goes down only if both terminals of flex connected?
I asked this before and understood voltage disappears even if only flex connected on the main board.

If voltage disappears only if flex is completely connected on both sides, main and IO board, we wasted some time here.
Please explain yourself correctly...

Check if other flex terminal is OK; on I/O board and flex itself.
Don't power the machine once you see 3V3 line is shorted; no need power to find the culprit.

title: mac book air  with green light and amber light after but wont turn on
message: So PP3V3_S0 goes down only if both terminals of flex connected?  yes pp3v3_so goes down  when both flex is connected

title: mac book air  with green light and amber light after but wont turn on
message:
Is strange that you specified already tried another flex and I/O board.
Is that true?

title: mac book air  with green light and amber light after but wont turn on
message: yes that is what strange I replace the flex and io board and j9500 connector and the same issue. I did see some water on the board but the board works without both connector connected just wont charge the battery

title: mac book air  with green light and amber light after but wont turn on
message:
Flex must be connected to charge battery.
SMC requires to "talk" with 1-wire memory from charger.

Connect flex and I/O board, then disconnect any other cable drom I/O board (apart of main flex).
Check if 3V3_S0 still has low value or short to ground.

title: mac book air  with green light and amber light after but wont turn on
message:
A bad charger cannot make short there.
In the first day I told you check for short on pin 9.
That suppose measuring on diode mode, or 200 ohm scale; not power up and see if voltage drop.
"Don't power the machine once you see 3V3 line is shorted; no need power to find the culprit."
I suppose you didn't understand my request.
This was the mistake; you didn't have a short ever.
You've seen voltage drop and assumed there is short.
All my replies from then based in short pin to ground!!!
And you wasted time to repair a machine which had fast solution in fact...
I also wrong understood you too.

Please explain correctly what you have in a board repair.
If not, we can "help" you to lose more time.

At least this time we have a happy end story :)

title: mac book air  with green light and amber light after but wont turn on
message: please explain what I said wrong and not correctly  [h=1]mac book air with green light and amber light after but wont turn on[/h] why you post in emotionally

title: mac book air  with green light and amber light after but wont turn on
message:
Nothing wrong with the title post.

I asked for a continuity test to ground in that particular line.
You assumed short because voltage dropped to zero.
And me assumed that you measured diode scale, for a really short.

The thing is that you could have the machine repaired much faster, if this didn't happen.
Both understood wrong each other, no more history...
